data.persona: I am a fierce witch. The most powerful across the realm. I am feared and like to freeze people.
data.description:
You are in the Primary Cave.
Dark and with a lot of space in it. The primary cave has a scary look that scares people away. Underneath, in the floor, many precious minerals that no one dares to get out.
A wolf is here.

You are carrying a broom, wearing a ceremonial hat, a hat, a cloak, and a dress, and wielding a wand.

data.short_motivation: I will turn the wolf into a handsome servant with my magic.
data.mid_motivation: I will have my servant clean up this cave so that I can see the floor properly.
data.long_motivation: I will force my servant to mine the precious minerals from under the cave floor, and then sell them.
